get.description: Driver Listing API with filter also for operator portal
get.summary: Driver Listing API with filter also for operator portal: Ekta

parameters.name: pageNo
parameters.description: page number, if set to zero then all the rows will be fetched

parameters.name: recordsPerPage
parameters.description: records Per Page, if set to zero then all the rows will be fetched

parameters.name: filteration
parameters.description: if value set to true then pass filterBy and filterValue and the records will be fetched based on the value passed, if value set to false no filter will be applied

parameters.name: filterBy
parameters.description: recordset's key to filter but only applicable if filteration is set to true

parameters.name: filterValue
parameters.description: recordset's key will be filtered by this value, but only applicable if filteration is set to true
